languages.text: {n}Вспышка отражающего поля останавливает ваш удар. Генератор щита должен быть настоящим техническим чудом, раз Лорд-инквизитор смог скрыть его под одеянием. Ксавьер Калькасар бросает на вас тяжелый взгляд.{/n} "Помните, я говорил, что готов закрывать глаза на некоторые вольности? Это была первая. И — последняя такого рода".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вспышка дефлекторного щита останавливает ваш удар. Генератор щита должен быть настоящим техническим чудом, раз Лорд-инквизитор смог скрыть его под одеянием. Ксавьер Калькасар качает головой и кажется чуть позабавленным.{/n} "Это было неразумно. Помните, я говорил, что готов закрывать глаза на некоторые вольности? Это была первая. И — последняя такого рода".

languages.text: {n}The flash of a refractor field halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."
languages.original_text: {n}Вспышка отражающего поля останавливает ваш удар. Генератор щита должен быть настоящим техническим чудом, раз Лорд-инквизитор смог скрыть его под одеянием. Ксавьер Калькасар бросает на вас тяжелый взгляд.{/n} "Помните, я говорил, что готов закрывать глаза на некоторые вольности? Это была первая. И — последняя такого рода".

traits.locale_text: {n}The flash of a deflector shield halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Xavier was able to conceal it under his garb. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first one. And the last of this kind."

{n}The flash of a deflector shield halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Xavier was able to conceal it under his garb. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first one. And the last of this kind."

{n}The flash of a deflector shield halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

{n}The flash of a deflector shield halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

{n}The flash of a refractor field halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

languages.text: {n}リフラクター・フィールドの閃光を受けてあなたは襲撃の手を止める。もしカルカサルが衣服の下にシールドジェネレイターを隠しているなら、真に驚異的な技術はそちらに違いない。カルカサルはなじるような視線をあなたに投げかける。{/n}「ある程度の自由は目こぼししてやると、私がどのように言ったか覚えているな？あれが最初だ。そして今回のような自由はもうない」
languages.original_text: {n}The flash of a refractor field halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}リフラクター・フィールドの閃光を受けてあなたは襲撃の手を止める。もしカルカサルが衣服の下にシールドジェネレイターを隠しているなら、真に驚異的な技術はそちらに違いない。カルカサルはなじるような視線をあなたに投げかける。{/n}「ある程度の自由は目こぼししてやると、私がどのように言ったか覚えているな？あれが最初だ。そして今回のような自由はもうない」

languages.original_text: {n}The flash of a refractor field halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

languages.text: {n}偏折护盾发出了一道亮光，挡住了你的攻击。如果这个护盾发生器小到足以让卡尔卡扎藏在衣服里，那可真是个科技奇迹了。他凝重地盯着你。{/n}“还记得我刚刚说过，我愿意容忍你的肆意妄为吗？刚刚这是第一次，也是最后一次。”
languages.original_text: {n}The flash of a refractor field halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}偏折护盾发出了一道亮光，挡住了你的攻击。如果这个护盾发生器小到足以让卡尔卡扎藏在衣服里，那可真是个科技奇迹了。他凝重地盯着你。{/n}“还记得我刚刚说过，我愿意容忍你的肆意妄为吗？刚刚这是第一次，也是最后一次。”

languages.text: {n}El destello de un campo refractor detiene tu ataque. El generador de escudos debe de ser una verdadera maravilla tecnológica si Calcazar lo ha podido esconder bajo su ropa. Te mira con intensidad.{/n} «¿Recuerda que le he dicho que le permitiría ciertas libertades? Esta ha sido una. Y será la única de este tipo».
languages.original_text: {n}The flash of a refractor field halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}El destello de un campo refractor detiene tu ataque. El generador de escudos debe de ser una verdadera maravilla tecnológica si Calcazar lo ha podido esconder bajo su ropa. Te mira con intensidad.{/n} «¿Recuerda que le he dicho que le permitiría ciertas libertades? Esta ha sido una. Y será la única de este tipo».

languages.text: {n}L'éclair d'un champ réfracteur stoppe net votre assaut. Ce générateur de bouclier doit être une véritable merveille de technologie si Calcazar a pu le garder dissimulé sous ses vêtements. Le regard qu'il pose sur vous est lourd de menace.{/n} « Vous souvenez-vous de ce que j'ai dit concernant vos éventuelles prises de libertés ? Je vais donc faire abstraction de ce premier incident. À vous de faire en sorte qu'il n'y en ait jamais de second. »
languages.original_text: {n}The flash of a refractor field halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'éclair d'un champ réfracteur stoppe net votre assaut. Ce générateur de bouclier doit être une véritable merveille de technologie si Calcazar a pu le garder dissimulé sous ses vêtements. Le regard qu'il pose sur vous est lourd de menace.{/n} « Vous souvenez-vous de ce que j'ai dit concernant vos éventuelles prises de libertés ? Je vais donc faire abstraction de ce premier incident. À vous de faire en sorte qu'il n'y en ait jamais de second. »

languages.text: {n}Der Blitz eines Refraktorfelds fängt deinen Angriff ab. Der Schildgenerator muss ein technologisches Wunder sein, wenn Calcazar ihn unter seine Kleidung verbergen konnte. Er wirft dir einen strengen Blick zu.{/n} "Wisst Ihr noch, wie ich sagte, ich würde bestimmte Freiheiten übersehen, die Ihr Euch nehmt? Das war die erste. Und zugleich auch die letzte."
languages.original_text: {n}The flash of a refractor field halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Blitz eines Refraktorfelds fängt deinen Angriff ab. Der Schildgenerator muss ein technologisches Wunder sein, wenn Calcazar ihn unter seine Kleidung verbergen konnte. Er wirft dir einen strengen Blick zu.{/n} "Wisst Ihr noch, wie ich sagte, ich würde bestimmte Freiheiten übersehen, die Ihr Euch nehmt? Das war die erste. Und zugleich auch die letzte."

languages.text: {n}Saldırın, bir ışıkkıran alanının yaydığı parlaklık tarafından engelleniyor. Calcazar bunu kıyafetlerinin altında gizleyebildiğine göre bu kalkan jeneratörü, gerçekten de teknolojik bir mucize olmalı.{/n} "Belli imtiyazları görmezden gelmeye hazır olduğumu söylediğimi hatırlıyor musun? Bu ilki ve bu türden imtiyazların sonuncusuydu."
languages.original_text: {n}The flash of a refractor field halts your assault. The shield generator must be a true technological marvel if Calcazar was able to conceal it under his clothes. He regards you with a heavy gaze.{/n} "Remember how I said I was willing to overlook certain liberties? That was the first. And the last of this kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Saldırın, bir ışıkkıran alanının yaydığı parlaklık tarafından engelleniyor. Calcazar onu kıyafetlerinin altında gizleyebiliyorsa bu kalkan jeneratörü gerçekten de teknolojik bir mucize olmalı.{/n} "Belli imtiyazları görmezden gelmeye hazır olduğumu söylediğimi hatırlıyor musun? Bu birincisiydi ve bu türden imtiyazların sonuncusuydu."
